issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: Fix potential NPE when gets RMApp from RM context

Hi [~Tao Yang]

Thanks for the patch. Generally, it is always good to fix such NPEs. But please allow me sometime to take a look why it happens and to pickup all the context. Will find sometime to review this week.

Thanks
Committed to trunk, cherry-picked to branch-3.0 and branch-3.1. Thanks for the contribution [~Tao Yang].

SUCCESS: Integrated in Jenkins build Hadoop-trunk-Commit #14108 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/14108/])
YARN-8222. Fix potential NPE when gets RMApp from RM context. (wwei: rev 251f528814c4a4647cac0af6effb9a73135db180)
